title: Season 2 Teaser - More Laughs and More Tea!
description:
Tune in to get a sneak peak into Season 2! From Scarlett Johansson suing Disney to Katy Perry suing a group of nuns over a convent, we're bringing you the juiciest legal issues in pop culture.  Don't forget to submit your questions  for our new Q&A segment too! Ask us about life, love or all things pop culture at legallyjudgy@gmail.com. 

LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
